```{r}

World_Happiness_Report_2020

df <- World_Happiness_Report_2020

vrb <- lm(Ladder_score ~ Ladder_score, data= df)
plot(df$`Ladder_score`, df$`Logged_GDP_per_capita`, xlab= 'Ladder Score', ylab='Logged GDP per capita', main="Correlation between Ladder score and Logged GDP per capita", col=c("green","blue")) + abline(vrb, col="red", lwd = 2)
dev.copy(png,'scatter.png')


```
